title: Amazing new youtube channel, should check it out!

embed.description: Hey guys, as my first upload i got a great game to show you. i want to start a series where i can give some advice and tips on current meta champs, along with some odd and weird builds.

replies.body:
first: dont call yourself amazing
second: drop the stupid name or AT LEAST the x's and the HD
third: have some unique trait so that people will have more incentive to watch you (no idea how anklespankin pulls in viewers tho)

Thunderlord's just overall is a bad option on Darius, especially since those extra stats in the tank tree are better and then 12 in Ferocity, whilst having Grasp of the Undying for some sustain and damage, every 4 seconds it just synergises with the playstyle of Darius better.
